Honestly, it's still too early to make any concrete accusations, but I do have some thoughts. Based on the discussions, everyone seems to be on the same page, wanting to give Bob and David a chance to lead. However, if I had to pick someone who might be Hitler or a fascist, I'd say Charlie seems a bit too eager to trust Bob and David without questioning their intentions. Charlie's statement about trusting their judgment and encouraging everyone to vote JA without much scrutiny raises some red flags for me. Of course, this could just be my paranoia, but I think it's essential to keep a close eye on Charlie's actions moving forward.
